description: A control area generating unit. This class is needed so that alternate control area definitions may include the same generating unit.   Note only one instance within a control area should reference a specific generating unit.

contents.name: ControlArea
contents.description: The parent control area for the generating unit specifications.

contents.name: GeneratingUnit
contents.description: The generating unit specified for this control area.  Note that a control area should include a GeneratingUnit only once.
